summary: Ryoshi Hey, buddy! - Ryoshi took a deep breath as he walked through Shibarium Block for the first time in 2 years, his eyes scanning every corner of the once-thriving community. It was a shadow of its former self, with buildings in disrepair and the streets littered with trash. The meme energy that had once fueled the hood was fading, and Ryoshi knew that something needed to be done.
